attributes.action: Organise / sponsor the organisation of a Home Nations football tournament in the summer of 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the abject failure of the English football team in their attempt to qualify for Euro 2008, and the fact that despite heroic efforts of Scotland and Northern Ireland no home nation football team has been able to qualify for Euro 2008, means that all home nations would be able to participate in a tournament between the teams.
By signing this petition we can promote a competitive home nations tournament that will help these teams to improve and increase the chances of qualification for the World Cup in 2010

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
